formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.

formElement.label: Scope of the Connection Factory:
formElement.documentation: Scope of the WebSphere Default messaging provider at which the Connection Factory is to be created.

formElement.label: Connection Factory Administrative Name:
formElement.documentation: The administrative name assigned to this Connection Factory.

formElement.label: Bus Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the service integration bus to which connections are made.

formElement.label: JNDI Name:
formElement.documentation: The name and location used to bind this object into WebSphere Application Server JNDI.

formElement.label: Connection Factory Type:
formElement.documentation: Type of Connection Factory to create. Should be one of Queue or Topic. To create a generic connection factory, leave this parameter unset. This parameter is being used only if Connection Factory is going to be created. Since factory type can't be updated in existing factory, this parameter will be omited if Connection Factory already exists.

formElement.label: Connection Factory Administrative Description:
formElement.documentation: An Administrative Description assigned to Connection Factory.

formElement.label: Additional Options:
formElement.documentation: Used to either override defaults or pass Custom Properties.
